text:
Contorion | Data Scientist | Onsite | Berlin, Germany

Contorion is a fast-growing online shop for professional industrial and trade supply. We invest in innovative machine learning solutions to support various areas of our business and to build a competitive advantage.

We're growing our data science team and are searching for new members to work on projects such as ad-bidding optimization, improving on-site search, and to develop our own recommendation solution.

If that sound interesting to you here's the full job description: https://www.contorion.de/jobs/detail/29947?lang=en

In case you have any questions drop us an email to jobs@contorion.de.
